channel.title: World Karamja
channel.description:
[center][size=30pt][font=monotype corsiva]World Karamja[/font][/size][/center] [b]Some introduction[/b] In case any of you all are wondering what happened to my other project "Gielixor", I am no longer developing it. Instead, I plan to develop this server which I believe will be very fun to play. I've thought of an original concept of this game (though it might not seem so original to you): the game shall primarily happen on an island. [hr] [b]Some progress log[/b]
All times are GMT +8. [18/11/10: 1630hrs] Downloaded the source [18/11/10: 1701hrs] Cleared spawns, added one spawn [18/11/10: 1701hrs] Changed spawn location [18/11/10: 1702hrs] Added a teleport (x, y, z) command [18/11/10: 1703hrs] [url=http://karamja.co.cc/img/Dialog_1.png]Added 1 dialog[/url] [18/11/10: 2204hrs] [url=http://karamja.co.cc/img/Announcement.png]Added global-message-to-server from GUI[/url] [18/11/10: 2207hrs] Called it a day [19/11/10: 1958hrs] Added better username formatting (e.g. New person -> New Person) [19/11/10: 1016hrs] Added a method that returns "no space in inventory" message [19/11/10: 1039hrs] Paused the development (I'm going out) [20/11/10: 1431hrs] Added a simple Thieving base [20/11/10: 1702hrs] Development paused [20/11/10: 2040hrs] Added a rights system [20/11/10: 2041hrs] Called it a day [21/11/10: 1430hrs] Completed Thieving base
[hr] [b]Some plans[/b] The following picture shall illustrate the whole island (with a few locations marked). [b]Location 1[/b] - The dungeon that leads to the wilderness (Mage Arena). [b]Location 2[/b] - The home. [b]Location 3[/b] - The skilling area. [b]Location 4[/b] - The premium member area. [img]http://imgur.com/bBqNX.png[/img] [b]Location 1[/b] As you can see, the wilderness is actually the Mage Arena. When you want to climb down the dungeon, there will be 2 options for you: "Multi combat" or "Single combat". Either way, you'll lose items when you die in the wilderness. Once you enter the multi-combat wilderness, it's free-for-all. Everyone can attack each other (but there are still level restrictions). To be safe, you'll have a 5-second "spawn time" to prevent yourself immediately being killed. On the other hand, the single-combat wilderness will be unique and different. It will be a lobby where players can request to fight one another. The "attack" option will still be there, however, instead of attacking a player upon clicking it, it will send somewhat a "duel request" and the fight will only begin when you accept it. When you die, you won't respawn at home. Instead, you will respawn at Musa Point. [b]Location 2[/b] Welcome to Shilo Village, your home. It has everything and really every features needed for a home. There is a bank, a general store and more areas for shops! Surrounding Shilo Village is an entirely new journey for you. [b]Location 3[/b] Brimhaven shall be the prime location for training skills. There is enough for woodcutting, firemaking, fishing, cooking, farming, mining, smithing and lots more! The purpose of Brimhaven is training skills - mainly the "core" and "basics". Better locations of training shall be spread out all around the island! [b]Location 4[/b] One long stretch of island will be dedicated for premium members. There you will find an array of fun activities to do (one will take place on the Ship Yard ;))! [hr] [b]Some application shit[/b] I'm looking for server developers [s]and a forum administrator[/s]. If you're interested, reply to this topic with this: Server developer team: - Rixxx - The Soul - ??????? - ???????
Age: MSN: Hours per day online: Proof of experience:
By the way, the server is based off Shards Revolution and the client is based off Galkon's Renamed Client (for any of you who wants to know). [hr] [b]Some information[/b] Join us on IRC at #karamja@irc.strictfp.com! I have set up an IRC channel on the StrictFP network. If you want to chat on the webclient (boo!!!), follow this link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/irc.php?img=0&host=irc.strictfp.com&channel=karamja or http://chat.strictfp.com/?channels=karamja

item.title: World Karamja
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

n10si t:

Since I’m hopeless, may someone show me how Shards Revolution differs from PI/Delta?

Shards Revolution is a Winterlove base coded by Graham and a few other people. Its a good choice if you are used to Winterlove type servers.

Ontopic: good luck with this project, Karamja has always been one of my favorite places on RS (mostly cuz years back i would spend hours there fishing lobsters, then selling em at the Fally bank Good times.)

Read full topic
